mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY( PAYNO, IMPID, TNO, CNO, MERCHANTID, APPLYNUM, CARDNAME, PAYMETHOD, CARDNUMBER, PAYAMOUNT, PAYNAME, TMNO, CMNO, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{payno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applynum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payamount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PAYNO PAYNO, P.IMPID IMPID, P.TNO TNO, P.CNO CNO, P.MERCHANTID MERCHANTID, P.APPLYNUM APPLYNUM, P.CARDNAME CARDNAME, P.PAYMETHOD PAYMETHOD, P.CARDNUMBER CARDNUMBER, P.PAYAMOUNT PAYAMOUNT, P.PAYNAME PAYNAME, P.TMNO TMNO, P.CMNO CMNO, P.DELETEYN DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(P.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(P.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM PAY P WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND TNO = #{tno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CNO = #{cno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (TMNO = #{tmno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR CMNO = #{cmno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
